int32 OS_CondVarBroadcast_Impl(const OS_object_token_t *token)
{
    int                                status;
    OS_impl_condvar_internal_record_t *impl;

    impl = OS_OBJECT_TABLE_GET(OS_impl_condvar_table, *token);

    status = pthread_cond_broadcast(&impl->cv);
    if (status != 0)
    {
        return OS_ERROR;
    }

    return OS_SUCCESS;
}

The external call pthread_cond_broadcast is a POSIX API and does not invoke the application’s OS_CondVarBroadcast_Impl. Based on the provided code, there is no evidence of direct or indirect recursion, so no fragments need investigation for MISRA C 2023 Rule 17.2.
